full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Number
**P2400146**

## Title
Support on Informatics and Digital Services

## Submission Deadline
January 22, 2024, 15:00:00 EST

## Introduction
The Government of Canada invites qualified bidders to submit proposals for a contract to provide support on informatics and digital services. This requirement is open to TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who are qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region.

## Scope of Work
The Office of the Information Commissioner of Canada (OIC) requires various resources on an as-and-when-requested basis to provide support on informatics and digital services. Bidders must submit a bid for all core resource categories, including:

* Level 3 Application/Software Architect - Cloud Support MS Dynamics 365
* Level 3 Application/Software Architect - Cloud Support SharePoint Office 365
* Level 3 Programmer/Software Developer - .NET/Dynamic CRM
* Level 3 Information Technology Security Threat and Risk Assessment and Certification and Accreditation Analyst
* Level 3 Network Analyst - Azure Cloud Administrator

## Eligible Suppliers
The tenders are open to the supply arrangement holders listed below:

1. Adirondack Information Management Inc.
2. ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp. and Randstad Interim Inc
3. Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.
4. Cistel Technology Inc.
5. Donna Conna Inc. and IBM Canada Limited (Joint Venture)
6. IPSS INC.
7. IT/NET Ottawa Inc., KPMG LLP (Joint Venture)
8. Leverage Technology Resources Inc.
9. Levio Conseils Inc.
10. Makwa Resourcing Inc. and TPG Technology Consulting Ltd. (Joint Venture)
11. NRNS Incorporated
12. Olav Consulting Corp
13. Randstad Interim Inc.
14. TekSystems Canada Corp.
15. THE AIM GROUP Inc.

## Security Requirements
Common PD-SRCL #06 applies. The minimum corporate security required is Designated Organization Screening (DOS) – Reliability, and the minimum resource security required is Reliability.

## Procurement Officer
Charissa Hsieh can be contacted at service./service@chrc-ccdp.gc.ca for inquiries.

## Method of Supply
The TBIPS Method of Supply is refreshed three times per year.

## Attachments
The tender document, including the terms and conditions, can be accessed at: https://canadabuys
